targets.rawSql: SELECT relkind FROM pg_class WHERE relname = '$tblname';

SELECT *
FROM (
         SELECT relpages ::BIGINT,
                (relpages * 8192::REAL)    AS relsize,
                reltuples ::REAL,
                age(relfrozenxid) ::BIGINT AS age
         FROM pg_class c
         WHERE oid = '${oid}'
         LIMIT 1) a,
     (
         SELECT n_live_tup     AS live_tup,
                n_dead_tup     AS dead_tup,
                CASE
                    WHEN (n_live_tup + n_dead_tup) > 0 THEN n_dead_tup::NUMERIC / (n_live_tup + n_dead_tup)
                    ELSE 0 END AS dead_ratio
         FROM pg_stat_user_tables
         WHERE relid = '${oid}'
         LIMIT 1
     ) b;
SELECT ratio AS "Bloat Ratio" FROM monitor.pg_table_bloat WHERE relname = '${tblname}'
SELECT oid, relnamespace, reltype, reloftype, relowner, relam, relfilenode, reltablespace, reltoastrelid FROM pg_class c WHERE oid = '$oid';

SELECT relhasindex :: INTEGER, relispartition :: INTEGER, relisshared :: INTEGER, relhasrules :: INTEGER, relhastriggers :: INTEGER, relhassubclass :: INTEGER, relrowsecurity :: INTEGER, relforcerowsecurity :: INTEGER, relispopulated :: INTEGER FROM pg_class c WHERE oid = '${oid}'

SELECT relpages ::BIGINT, (relpages * 8192::REAL) AS relsize, reltuples ::REAL, relallvisible ::BIGINT, relnatts ::BIGINT, relchecks ::BIGINT, relfrozenxid, age(relfrozenxid) ::BIGINT AS age, relminmxid FROM pg_class c WHERE oid = '${oid}';

SELECT 
   CASE relpersistence WHEN 'u' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS relunlogged,
   CASE relpersistence WHEN 't' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS reltemporary
FROM pg_class c WHERE oid = '${oid}'
SELECT unnest(relacl) AS acl FROM pg_class c WHERE oid = '${oid}';
SELECT unnest(reloptions) AS opt FROM pg_class c WHERE oid = '${oid}';

SELECT seq_scan,
       seq_tup_read,
       idx_scan,
       idx_tup_fetch,
       n_tup_ins,
       n_tup_upd,
       n_tup_del,
       n_tup_hot_upd
FROM pg_stat_user_tables
WHERE relid = '$oid' LIMIT 1;

SELECT vacuum_count + autovacuum_count                   AS vacuum_total,
       vacuum_count,
       to_char(last_vacuum, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')     AS last_vacuum,
       date_trunc('second', now() - last_vacuum)         AS since_last_vacuum,
       autovacuum_count,
       to_char(last_autovacuum, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_autovacuum,
       date_trunc('second', now() - last_autovacuum)     AS since_last_autovacuum
FROM pg_stat_user_tables
WHERE relid = '$oid'
LIMIT 1;

SELECT analyze_count + autoanalyze_count                   AS analyze_total,
       analyze_count,
       to_char(last_analyze, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')     AS last_analyze,
       date_trunc('second', now() - last_analyze)         AS since_last_analyze,
       autoanalyze_count,
       to_char(last_autoanalyze, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_autoanalyze,
       date_trunc('second', now() - last_autoanalyze)     AS since_last_autoanalyze,
       n_mod_since_analyze
FROM pg_stat_user_tables
WHERE relid = '${oid}'
LIMIT 1;

SELECT *, pg_catalog.format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod) AS atttype
FROM pg_attribute a LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
    SELECT pg_catalog.pg_get_expr(d.adbin, d.adrelid, true) AS def
    FROM pg_catalog.pg_attrdef d
    WHERE d.adrelid = a.attrelid
      AND d.adnum = a.attnum
      AND a.atthasdef
    ) d ON true
WHERE attrelid = '${oid}' AND attnum > 0 ORDER BY attnum;
SELECT *, pg_get_indexdef(indexrelid) AS def FROM pg_stat_user_indexes WHERE relid = '${oid}';

list.definition: SELECT nspname || '.' || relname FROM pg_namespace nsp JOIN pg_class rel ON nsp.oid = rel.relnamespace WHERE nspname NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'monitor', 'information_schema','pg_toast') AND relkind = ANY(ARRAY['r', 'm', 't' ] );
list.label: Relation
list.name: relname
list.query: SELECT nspname || '.' || relname FROM pg_namespace nsp JOIN pg_class rel ON nsp.oid = rel.relnamespace WHERE nspname NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'monitor', 'information_schema','pg_toast') AND relkind = ANY(ARRAY['r', 'm', 't' ] );

list.definition: SELECT rel.oid AS oid FROM pg_namespace nsp JOIN pg_class rel ON nsp.oid = rel.relnamespace WHERE nspname = '${nspname}' AND relname = '${tblname}';
list.label: Table OID
list.name: oid
list.query: SELECT rel.oid AS oid FROM pg_namespace nsp JOIN pg_class rel ON nsp.oid = rel.relnamespace WHERE nspname = '${nspname}' AND relname = '${tblname}';
